title: CRAB AND SHRIMP AND WILD RICECASSEROLE
directions: In saucepan, saute the onions, celery and green pepper until soft. Combine remaining ingredients, except bread crumbs, and mix until well blended. Pour into greased 13x9 Pyrex dish. Top with buttered bread crumbs and bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. Will freeze.
ingredients: 2 lbs. shrimp and crab, cooked and chopped
4 green onions with tops and bottoms, chopped
1 pkg. UNCLE BEN'SÂ® Long Grain and Wild Rice, cooked as pkg. directs
1 (16 oz.) can green beans, well drained
1 (5 oz.) can water chestnuts, sliced and drained
